remarks: Lemma for ~ nobndup and ~ nobnddown .  Calculate the value of ` ( C X. { X } ) ` at the minimal ordinal whose value is different from ` X ` .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Aug-2011.)
statement:
nobndlem7.1 $e |- X e. { 1o , 2o } $.
nobndlem7.2 $e |- C = |^| { a e. On | A. n e. F E. b e. a ( n ` b ) =/= X } $.
nobndlem7 $p |- ( ( F C_ No /\ A e. F ) -> ( ( C X. { X } ) ` |^| { x e. On | ( A ` x ) =/= X } ) = X ) $.
$d A a b n $.
$d A a b x $.
$d F a b n $.
$d X a b n $.
$d X a b x $.
